cab.content: SECRET.?or the information of the War Cabinet. From the First Sea Lord.The following list shows the urgent naval work on which the most important delays are occurring as a result of the strikes which are at present taking placeArmour. Steel plates. Wire rope.Gun mountings for Light Cruisers? Destroyers, Defensively Armed"Merchant Ships and SubmarinesTorpedoes, mines, paravanes and depth charges.11" and 7.5" Howitzers and 7,5" guns and below.Shell of all sizes and Q.F. cartridge cases.Auxiliary machinery for all classes of ships, steel castings, copper pipes and condenser tubes.Engines for trawlers., mine-sweepers, patrolVessels and airships. Electrical equipment generally for H.M.Shipsand Air Stations.(intd.) J.R.J.11th May, 1917.
